name: cni-tsnr-map
label: CNI: temporal SNR analysis
description: Calculate signal fluctuation to noise ratio (SFNR), temporal SNR, and radius of decorrelation (from Weisskoff analysis) of a time series in a 4D NIFTI.

discarded_volume.description: The number of volume to discard from the beginning of the time series

mask_threshold.description: Fractional intensity threshold (0->1); smaller values give larger brain outline estimates

roi_size.description: Upper limit of ROI length for Weisskoff analysis

save_all_outputs.description: Save all intermediate results, including raw tSNR, detrended time series, mask, etc

author: Hua Wu
